list.name: Changes
list.comment: chore: update `.idea` configs for workspace and VCS settings

task.summary: Default task

feat: add mobile device detection and dynamic API base URL selection
- Implemented `isMobileDevice` utility for detecting mobile devices. - Introduced `getApiBaseUrl` to dynamically select the appropriate API base URL based on device type. - Updated all API calls to use `getApiBaseUrl`.

feat: add mutually exclusive checkboxes for flow type selection
- Introduced cross-device and compatibility checkboxes with mutual exclusivity logic. - Updated UI layout with a new checkbox row in `index.html` and styles in `styles.css`.

feat: hide checkbox row on mobile devices
- Updated `script.js` to hide the checkbox row when a mobile device is detected using `isMobileDevice`.

refactor: move mobile detection logic earlier for pre-render usage
- Relocated `isMobileDevice` function for immediate use during initial scripting phases. - Updated checkbox row hiding logic to execute before page rendering on mobile devices.

feat: add inline mobile detection and hide checkbox row for mobile users
- Embedded mobile detection script directly in `index.html` for early execution. - Updated styles to hide the checkbox row (`.checkbox-row`) by default on mobile devices.

feat: add inline mobile detection and hide checkbox row for mobile users
- Embedded mobile detection script directly in `index.html` for early execution. - Updated styles to hide the checkbox row (`.checkbox-row`) by default on mobile devices.

refactor: remove checkbox mutual exclusivity logic and simplify mobile device detection
- Eliminated unused cross-device and compatibility checkbox logic. - Replaced `isMobileDevice` function with inline `is-mobile` class detection for consistency and simplicity.

feat: add compatibility checkbox for API selection and update `getApiBaseUrl` logic
- Introduced `compatibilityCheckbox` for toggling compatibility mode when selecting the API base URL. - Updated `getApiBaseUrl` to account for checkbox state, alongside mobile detection. - Minor cosmetic fixes for consistent formatting.

feat: preselect cross-device checkbox for non-mobile users
- Automatically checks the `crossDeviceCheckbox` when users are not on a mobile device.

feat: reintroduce mutual exclusivity for compatibility and cross-device checkboxes
- Added event listeners to ensure only one of the checkboxes can be checked at a time.
refactor: simplify UI by removing redundant subtitles, labels, and endpoint info
chore: update API base URLs to local development endpoints
refactor: streamline OTP verification UI by removing redundant email input label and reorganizing button order
refactor: shorten email verification button text for concise UI
feat: add disabled email confirmation input field to OTP form
refactor: adjust margin-bottom for back button to improve spacing
refactor: adjust margin-bottom for back button to improve spacing
refactor: remove redundant email display line in OTP screen setup
refactor: add top margin to button for improved spacing
refactor: remove unused email display element from OTP screen
refactor: update OTP screen button texts for improved clarity
refactor: adjust back button margin and add placeholder styles for OTP inputs
refactor: relocate checkbox row to email verification screen for better UI structure
refactor: update default checkbox selection logic for clearer functionality
refactor: enforce single and mandatory checkbox selection logic
refactor: implement custom styling for checkboxes with filled dot appearance
refactor: add hover tooltips for checkbox labels and update cursor style
fix: adjust button spacing and add placeholder styling for OTP input

feat: add user-agent detection and simplify email verification form
- Added script to detect mobile or desktop via user-agent and apply corresponding classes to the HTML element. - Simplified email and OTP forms by removing redundant labels, subtitles, and endpoint information. - Updated button labels and placeholders for better user clarity.

feat: update API base URL to support same-device email verification flow
- Switched `API_BASE_URL` to use `https://auth.bankapp.online/api/mobile` for a simpler same-device verification process. - Avoids complexities and errors related to cross-device verification.
chore: update `.idea` configs for workspace and VCS settings

MESSAGE.value:
fix: restore mutual exclusivity logic for compatibility and cross-device checkboxes
- Reintroduced event listeners ensuring only one of `compatibilityCheckbox` or `crossDeviceCheckbox` can be selected at a time.

feat: reintroduce mutual exclusivity for compatibility and cross-device checkboxes
- Added event listeners to ensure only one of the checkboxes can be checked at a time.
refactor: remove embedded endpoint information from UI
refactor: simplify UI by removing redundant subtitles, labels, and endpoint info
chore: update API base URLs to local development endpoints
refactor: streamline OTP verification UI by removing redundant email input label and reorganizing button order
refactor: shorten email verification button text for concise UI
feat: add disabled email confirmation input field to OTP form
refactor: adjust margin-bottom for back button to improve spacing
refactor: remove redundant email display line in OTP screen setup
refactor: add top margin to button for improved spacing
refactor: remove unused email display element from OTP screen
refactor: update OTP form button text to "Verify Email" for clarity
refactor: update OTP screen button texts for improved clarity
refactor: adjust back button margin and add placeholder styles for OTP inputs
refactor: relocate checkbox row to email verification screen for better UI structure
refactor: update default checkbox selection logic for clearer functionality
refactor: enforce single and mandatory checkbox selection logic
refactor: implement custom styling for checkboxes with filled dot appearance
refactor: add hover tooltips for checkbox labels and update cursor style
fix: adjust button spacing and add placeholder styling for OTP input

feat: add user-agent detection and simplify email verification form
- Added script to detect mobile or desktop via user-agent and apply corresponding classes to the HTML element. - Simplified email and OTP forms by removing redundant labels, subtitles, and endpoint information. - Updated button labels and placeholders for better user clarity.

feat: update API base URL to support same-device email verification flow
- Switched `API_BASE_URL` to use `https://auth.bankapp.online/api/mobile` for a simpler same-device verification process. - Avoids complexities and errors related to cross-device verification.

feat: add HTTP client with X-Correlation-ID support and integrate into script
- Implemented an HTTP client to handle X-Correlation-ID automatically. - Replaced native `fetch` calls with the new `httpClient.fetch` across the application. - Updated `index.html` to use ES module for script import.
(cherry picked from commit 06df14731b601e80f51f2a8cb98cf72af66887e4)
chore: update `.idea` configs for workspace and VCS settings
